blogData.title: Product Update: May 2019
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai dubbing, product update video translator, product update video translation, value proposition video transcriber, value proposition video translator, traction video transcriber, traction video translator, use case video transcriber, use case video translator, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
We have been putting in for a number of grant applications in the innovation space. One of the applications needed a small video as part of the application process.

The video covers the basic use cases, and we added the captions to the asset.

May 2019: Product update

Conclusion

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform, or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos
nodes.description: Learn how to easily add subtitles to your YouTube videos to enhance accessibility and reach a wider audience.
nodes.coverAlt: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos

nodes.title: Top 5 Translation Tools for Professionals and Learners
nodes.description: Discover the top 5 translation tools to enhance your professional and learning experiences. Learn about their features, pros, and cons in this article!

nodes.title: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation
nodes.description: In the age of digital connectivity, leveraging video translation can play a pivotal role in raising awareness and mobilizing communities worldwide to protect and preserve our rivers.
nodes.coverAlt: How Video Translation Can Help River Conservation
